pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer mortality and incidence rates have been gradually increasing for decades in the United States, with an accelerated increase in incidence noted in the past several years. This study explores in detail the occurrence of prostate cancer in southeast Michigan from 1973 through 1991.

metaData.source:
Recent progress in treating advanced prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32209821/
